```{r}
data <- read.csv("PartExtras/matcher_times.csv")
data2 <- read.csv("PartExtras/part2.csv")

plot(
  data$n,
  data$time,
  type = "b",
  pch = 19,
  xlab = "n",
  ylab = "time (seconds)",
  main = "Runtime: Matcher vs Verifier"
)

lines(
  data2$n,
  data2$time,
  type = "b",
  pch = 17
)

legend(
  "topleft",
  legend = c("Matcher", "Verifier"),
  pch = c(19, 17),
  bty = "n"
)
```
